**Ozzy**, d, is a [unique](/wiki/Unique "Unique") [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). He is a [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"), [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") [canine](/wiki/Canine "Canine") that can be seen via [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"), and has the ability to go [berserk](/wiki/Berserk_\(EvilHack\) "Berserk (EvilHack)") when at low HP. He acts as one of the loyal companions of [Kathryn the Ice Queen](/wiki/Kathryn_the_Ice_Queen "Kathryn the Ice Queen") alongside [Bourbon](/wiki/Bourbon "Bourbon"): attacking Kathryn causes them to become hostile, and defeating Kathryn and breaking her curse pacifies them both.

Ozzy has a powerful bite attack and a claw attack, and possesses [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance") and [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Origin](#Origin)
- [3 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)
- [4 References](#References)

## Generation

Ozzy is created peaceful. He is always generated in the [Ice Queen's Realm](/wiki/Ice_Queen%27s_Realm "Ice Queen's Realm"), occupying the square south of the lower fountain (which represents his "water bowl") at level creation.

Ozzy will revive at full HP and turn peaceful upon defeat.

## Origin

Ozzy is based on one of the [EvilHack developer's](/wiki/User:K2 "User:K2") beloved German Shepherd dogs; he is the older of the two. In 2019, the developer promised his then-seven-year-old daughter Kathryn that he would add her and their dogs to EvilHack, and made them the bosses of a special branch.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Encyclopedia entry

I am your friend, your partner,  
Your defender, your dog.  
You are my life, my leader.  
I will be yours, faithful and true,  
To the last beat of my heart.  
I am the German Shepherd.  
\[ Author unknown ]  
  
Koa: July 25th, 2009 - November 29th, 2020  
Ozzy: January 13th, 2015 - present  
Bourbon: April 19th, 2016 - present

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [New branch: The Ice Queen's Realm.](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/commit/113aae435bc8823acc978097f99a19aaf9f3b2b1)

Reference EvilHack 0.8.3 - monst.c, line 375

Ozzy, d, is a unique monster that appears in EvilHack. He is a strong, carnivorous canine that can be seen via infravision, and has the ability to go berserk when at low HP. He acts as one of the loyal companions of Kathryn the Ice Queen alongside Bourbon: attacking Kathryn causes them to become hostile, and defeating Kathryn and breaking her curse pacifies them both.

Ozzy has a powerful bite attack and a claw attack, and possesses sleep resistance, cold resistance and stoning resistance.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Origin
  • 3 Encyclopedia entry
  • 4 References

Generation

Ozzy is created peaceful. He is always generated in the Ice Queen's Realm, occupying the square south of the lower fountain (which represents his "water bowl") at level creation.

Ozzy will revive at full HP and turn peaceful upon defeat.

Origin

Ozzy is based on one of the EvilHack developer's beloved German Shepherd dogs; he is the older of the two. In 2019, the developer promised his then-seven-year-old daughter Kathryn that he would add her and their dogs to EvilHack, and made them the bosses of a special branch.[1]

Encyclopedia entry

I am your friend, your partner,
Your defender, your dog.
You are my life, my leader.
I will be yours, faithful and true,
To the last beat of my heart.
I am the German Shepherd.
[ Author unknown ]

Koa: July 25th, 2009 - November 29th, 2020
Ozzy: January 13th, 2015 - present
Bourbon: April 19th, 2016 - present

References

  1. ↑ New branch: The Ice Queen's Realm.

'''Ozzy''', {{brown|d}}, is a [[unique]] [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]]. He is a [[strong]], [[carnivorous]] [[canine]] that can be seen via [[infravision]], and has the ability to go [[Berserk (EvilHack)|berserk]] when at low HP. He acts as one of the loyal companions of [[Kathryn the Ice Queen]] alongside [[Bourbon]]: attacking Kathryn causes them to become hostile, and defeating Kathryn and breaking her curse pacifies them both.

Ozzy has a powerful bite attack and a claw attack, and possesses [[sleep resistance]], [[cold resistance]] and [[stoning resistance]].

==Generation==
Ozzy is created peaceful. He is always generated in the [[Ice Queen's Realm]], occupying the square south of the lower fountain (which represents his "water bowl") at level creation.

Ozzy will revive at full HP and turn peaceful upon defeat.

==Origin==
Ozzy is based on one of the [[User:K2|EvilHack developer's]] beloved German Shepherd dogs; he is the older of the two. In 2019, the developer promised his then-seven-year-old daughter Kathryn that he would add her and their dogs to EvilHack, and made them the bosses of a special branch.<ref>[https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/commit/113aae435bc8823acc978097f99a19aaf9f3b2b1 New branch: The Ice Queen's Realm.]</ref>
